metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25667 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: TIFFGetProfiles() in /coders/tiff.c calls strstr() which causes a large out-of-bounds read when it searches for `"dc:format=\"image/dng\"` within `profile` due to improper string handling, when a crafted input file is provided to ImageMagick. The patch uses a StringInfo type instead of a raw C string to remedy this. This could cause an impact to availability of the application. This flaw affects ImageMagick versions prior to 7.0.9-0.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> per Debian, introduced in v6.9.10-63 and fixed in 6.9.10-69

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
